name: card-05

files.content: import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardDescription, CardTitle, CardFooter } from '@/components/ui/card' const CardTopImageDemo = () => { return ( Ethereal Swirl Gradient Smooth, flowing gradients blending rich reds and blues in an abstract swirl. ) } export default CardTopImageDemo
